decks.notes: The main concept of this Esper Aggro deck is to quickly deploy aggressive creatures like Geist of Saint Traft and Ocelot Pride, supported by disruptive spells like Daze and Force of Will to control the board. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provide card advantage and additional threats, while Psychic Frog acts as a unique form of removal. The deck aims to apply pressure early on and disrupt the opponent's game plan with a combination of efficient creatures and versatile spells, backed up by a solid mana base with dual lands and fetch lands.

The main concept of this deck is to use the combo of Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill your opponent's library and win the game. The deck also utilizes Goblin Engineer and Goblin Welder to tutor for or recur key combo pieces. The deck includes disruption in the form of Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast, as well as removal and burn spells like Lightning Bolt. Urza's Saga helps find key artifacts, while Ancient Tomb provides additional mana acceleration. The deck also includes some utility cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Agatha's Soul Cauldron to improve consistency and protect the combo.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining pressure with aggressive creatures. By using efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Sheoldred's Edict, along with countermagic like Daze and Force of Will, the deck aims to control the game tempo. Cards like Ponder and Brainstorm help dig for key pieces, while creatures like Barrowgoyf and Nethergoyf provide a clock for the opponent. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Psychic Frog provide card advantage and additional disruption. The mana base is optimized for consistency and disruption with Wasteland and fetch lands.

The main idea of this deck is to utilize the powerful mana acceleration and synergy within the Elf tribe to quickly generate a large amount of mana, allowing for explosive plays and the ability to cast high-cost spells such as Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. The deck also incorporates a combo element involving Nomads en-Kor and Springheart Nantuko to loop through the deck and find key pieces to win the game. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Allosaurus Shepherd and Gaea's Cradle further enhance the deck's ability to generate and utilize mana efficiently.
